summary.description:
An approach for identifying N-acetylglucosamine interacting residues of a protein from its primary sequence.

This is for predicting NAGbinding sites in a protein.

A web server for predicting N-Acetylglucosamine (NAG) interacting residues in a protein.

Home page of NAGbinder, which is a web based tool developed for predicting of NAG binding residues in a protein.

NAGbinder is a Python-based tool for predicting NAG interacting residues in an uncharacterized protein chain.

Prediction of NAG interacting residues.

Reference: Patiyal et. al. (2019) NAGbinder: An approach for identifying N-acetylglucosamine interacting residues of a protein from its primary sequence
summary.name: NAGbinder
